org.newdawn.slick.font

Class HieroSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.font.HieroSettings

  • public class HieroSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the settings needed to configure a UnicodeFont.

        Parameters:

        Throws:
